articles.title: Joint Chiefs Chairman Gen. Mark Milley tests positive for Covid-19 - CNN
articles.description: Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Gen. Mark Milley tested positive for Covid-19 Sunday and "is experiencing very minor symptoms," Joint Staff spokesperson Col. Dave Butler announced Monday.
